Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 inch ginger, grated, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 14.5 ounce can diced tomatoes, 15 ounce can chickpeas, 5 ounces spinach, 1/2 cup vegetable, Salt, Fresh parsley, Jasmine rice
Instruction: 1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. 2. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger to the pot and cook for another minute until fragrant. 3. Stir in the cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, and cayenne pepper. Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly, until fragrant. 4. Add the diced tomatoes and chickpeas to the pot. Season with salt to taste. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. 5. Stir in the spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes. 6. Serve the curry over jasmine rice. Garnish with fresh parsley.
